                       throws DatabaseException
        Creates a new instance of the database controller
        Parameters:
        database - the local MySQL database path
        root - the root name
        password - the database password
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if there is a problem with the connection

      • initiateBackgroundManager

        public void initiateBackgroundManager()
        This method creates a new instance of the background tasks manager

      • clientConnected

        protected void clientConnected​(ConnectionToClient client)
        Description copied from class: AbstractServer
        Hook method called each time a new client connection is accepted. The default implementation does nothing.
        Overrides:
        clientConnected in class AbstractServer
        Parameters:
        client - the connection connected to the client.

      • clientDisconnected

        protected void clientDisconnected​(ConnectionToClient client)
        Description copied from class: AbstractServer
        Hook method called each time a client disconnects. The default implementation does nothing. The method may be overridden by subclasses but should remains synchronized.
        Overrides:
        clientDisconnected in class AbstractServer
        Parameters:
        client - the connection with the client.

      • isClientConnected

        private boolean isClientConnected​(ConnectionToClient client)
        Parameters:
        client - the ConnectionToClient that is checked
        Returns:
        true if the client is currently connected, false if not.

      • areAllClientsDisconnected

        public boolean areAllClientsDisconnected()
        Returns:
        true if all clients are disconnected, false otherwise.

      • importUsersFromExternalSystem

        public StaffController.ImportStatus importUsersFromExternalSystem()
        This method is called in order to import users data from the Users Management System into GoNature database

      • initializeSemaphores

        private void initializeSemaphores()
        This method initializes the semaphores array list for the critical sections control

      • handleMessageFromClient

        protected void handleMessageFromClient​(java.lang.Object msg,
                                       ConnectionToClient client)
        Description copied from class: AbstractServer
        Handles a command sent from one client to the server. This MUST be implemented by subclasses, who should respond to messages. This method is called by a synchronized method so it is also implcitly synchronized.
        Specified by:
        handleMessageFromClient in class AbstractServer
        Parameters:
        msg - the message sent.
        client - the connection connected to the client that sent the message.
